attributes.long-description:
Get this special offer now! We have combined two great offers into one excellent bundle at a great price.

This bundle includes:
- VR Invaders Complete Edition
- Skyforge: 6000 Argents
VR Invaders Complete Edition:
Dive into a story-driven sci-fi shooter that pushes your PS VR hardware to its limits with VR Invaders. You are playing the hacker Thomas Hall tasked with fighting legions of enemy drones in order to save other VR users that get attacked by deadly viruses in virtual reality. Blow your enemies to pieces in frenzied shooter action: slow down time, evade attacks, or block shots with your shield.
Skyforge: 6000 Argents:
Move your game to the next level in Skyforge with our 6000 Argent Pack. Argents are a game currency that you can use for different purposes. You can spend them in the in-game Market where you can purchase cool costumes, amazing mounts, helpful consumables, and more.

VR headset required

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

attributes.name: VR Invaders / Skyforge 6000 Argents Bundle
